alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 02 at 6:33PM CST until January 02 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Eastern Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... South central Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Western Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 632 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 11 miles east of Jonesboro, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Claiborne, West Monroe, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Chatham, Eros, Drew, Cheniere, Calhoun, Mineral Springs, Caderville, Eureka and Folksville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
